source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000010_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>(-Distressed Townsman-)Sin eaters sighted! They're coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000010_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>(-Взбудораженный горожанин-)Замечены пожиратели! Они идут!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Excellent. The barrier is holding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Великолепно. Барьер держится.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000030_ALISAIE<tab>That's good news for the Crystarium, but what of the rest of Lakeland?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000030_ALISAIE<tab>Отличные новости для Кристариума, но что насчёт остального Озёрного края?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyna and the city guard have taken to the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Лина и городская стража уже отправились вперёд.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thancred and the others have already joined them. Let us do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Танкред и остальные уже успели к ним присоединиться. Давайте не будем отставать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000060_RYNE<tab>There are so many...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000060_RYNE<tab>Их слишком много...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000070_LYNA<tab>Godsdammit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000070_LYNA<tab>Проклятие!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000080_RYNE<tab>Lyna!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000080_RYNE<tab>Лина!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000090_RYNE<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000090_RYNE<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000100_RYNE<tab>Lyna, hold on!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000100_RYNE<tab>Лина, держись!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000110_LYNA<tab>They...they turned on me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000110_LYNA<tab>Они... они кинулись на меня...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000120_THANCRED<tab>(COUGHING BLOOD)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000120_THANCRED<tab>(COUGHING BLOOD)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000130_RYNE<tab>Thancred!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000130_RYNE<tab>Танкред!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000140_THANCRED<tab>This...one...is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000140_THANCRED<tab>Этот... мой!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000150_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>We need only hold out a little while longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000150_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Нам нужно продержаться ещё немного.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000160_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Reinforcements are coming, remember? The captain said so. We're going to be all right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000160_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Подкрепления идут, помните? Капитан сказала. Всё будет хорошо...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Run! Run, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Бегите! Бегите, идиоты!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000180_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>The Warrior of Darkness has returned. The bloody <var 1A 02 /var>night<var 1A 01 /var> has returned! So stay with me, eh? You can't go dying now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000180_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Воин Тени вернулся. Ночь, чёрт бы её побрал, вернулась! Не оставляй меня. Не смей у меня умирать!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Godsdammit! Please let this work, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var> let this work...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Проклятье! Прошу, пусть сработает, ПРОШУ, ПУСТЬ СРАБОТАЕТ!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(WHIFF GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(WHIFF GRUNT)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000210_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>No! N-No, stay back! Stay back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000210_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Нет! Н-Нет, назад! Назад!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000220_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Help, help! Someone, anyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000220_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Помогите, помогите! Кто-нибудь!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Why did you spare <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? Why? What have I done to deserve this <var 1A 02 /var>mercy<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Зачем <var 1A 02 /var>я жив<var 1A 01 /var>? Ради чего? Чем я заслужил такое!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000240_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Forward! <var 1A 02 /var>Forward<var 1A 01 /var>! If you can still hold a sword, follow me! Wounded, to the rear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000240_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Вперёд! <var 1A 02 /var>Вперёд<var 1A 01 /var>! Мне нужны все, кто способен держать меч! Раненые, в тыл!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000250_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Weapons at the ready! Let's make this count!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000250_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Оружие на изготовку! Продадим свои жизни подороже!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Fight and struggle. Seek salvation by your own hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Деритесь и стойте до конца. Никто вас не спасёт, пока сами этого не сделаете.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Though the losses be grave, endure them. Though the victories be hollow, claim them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Какими бы не были потери, держитесь. Какими бы пустыми не были победы, сражайтесь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000280_LYNA<tab>Oh. I did not see you there. Is there something you need?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000280_LYNA<tab>О. Я тебя не заметила. Тебе что-нибудь нужно?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>No, no, I'm fine. How are you feeling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Мне - ничего. С вами всё в порядке?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Shouldn't you be resting? What would the guard do without their captain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>А вам не нужно отдохнуть? Что гвардия будет делать без капитана?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000290_LYNA<tab>Injuries are part and parcel of battle. While there's breath in my lungs, I shall see my duties done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000290_LYNA<tab>Раны в битве неизбежны. Покуда я могу дышать, я буду исполнять свой долг.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000300_LYNA<tab>...Appoint another. A captain's place is with her soldiers in the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000300_LYNA<tab>...Неуместная шутка. Место капитана на поле боя, с его солдатами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000310_LYNA<tab>Don't pretend you are not of the same mind. You fought well today. Saved a great many lives. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000310_LYNA<tab>Не делай вид, что не разделяешь моего мнения. Ты тоже отлично сегодня <var 08 E905 ((сражалась. Спасла)) ((сражался. Спас)) /var> множество жизней. Благодарю.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000320_LYNA<tab>Unfortunately, this war is far from over. We must replenish our ranks and shore up our defenses before they attack again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000320_LYNA<tab>Увы, эта война далека от завершения. Нам нужно восполнить наши ряды и позаботиться об укреплениях, пока они снова не напали.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000330_LYNA<tab>Now, if you will excuse me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000330_LYNA<tab>А теперь прошу простить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000340_LYNA<tab>(FALLING TO GROUND REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000340_LYNA<tab>(FALLING TO GROUND REAX)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000350_LYNA<tab>I...am fine...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000350_LYNA<tab>Я... нормально...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000360_LYNA<tab>Completely...and utterly...fine! Better than fine! Hale and hearty and still alive to mourn those who are not. Who I failed to protect when they needed me most.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000360_LYNA<tab>Со мной... всё... нормально! И даже лучше! Цела и невредима, а вдобавок жива для того, чтобы оплакивать павших. Тех, кого я не смогла защитить, тех, кто так нуждался во мне...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000370_LYNA<tab>We've come so far─so <var 1A 02 /var>godsdamned<var 1A 01 /var> far! I could have sworn the end was in sight. And now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000370_LYNA<tab>Мы так далеко зашли... проклятье, так далеко! Готова была поклясться, скоро всё кончилось бы. А теперь...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000380_LYNA<tab>Now they will never see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000380_LYNA<tab>А теперь они не увидят победы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000390_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Impudent worms of the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000390_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Вонтри-)Наглые букашки Кристариума!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000400_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)The tragedy that has befallen you is of your own making. Divine retribution for your defiance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000400_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Вонтри-)Трагедия, жертвами которой вы стали - дело ваших собственных рук. Божественное воздаяние за ваше неповиновение.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000410_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)The heavens have bequeathed to you a benevolent savior─me! I offer you freedom from pain and suffering─a paradise where man and sin eater might live in peace and harmony...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000410_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Вонтри-)Небеса даровали вам сиятельного спасителя - в лице меня! Я предлагаю вам свободу от боли и страданий - рай, где человек и пожиратели грешников могут жить в мире и гармонии...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000420_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Why, already our winged brothers and sisters regard me and mine as kin, alike to them in beauty and purity!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000420_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Вонтри-)Уже сейчас наши крылатые братья и сёстры расценивают нас как равных себе, в нашей красоте и святости!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000430_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)But you─you not only reject my proffered hand, but raise your own against my sin eaters. 'Tis only right that they respond in kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000430_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Вонтри-)Но вы! Вы не только отвергли протянутую мной руку, но ещё и поднялись против моих пожирателей грешников. Естественно, они отплатили вам тем же.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000440_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Let this be a lesson to all those who would walk the path of sin─the wicked shall not inherit this world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000440_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Вонтри-)Пускай это станет уроком для всех, кто избрал идти по пути греховного - нечестивым недолго осталось на этом свете!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friends. With your aid we have weathered a brutal assault...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Друзья мои, с вашей помощью мы выстояли против сильнейшей атаки...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000460_EMETSELCH<tab>Sorry I'm late. Though I would not have been had anyone thought to notify me in advance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000460_EMETSELCH<tab>Простите за опоздание. Если бы кто-нибудь предупредил меня заблаговременно, знаете ли...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...As I was saying, it was only with your aid that we weathered this assault. Without it, the Crystarium and all who dwell here would now be gone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Итак, лишь с вашей помощью нам удалось выстоять против этой атаки. Без вас и Кристариума, и всех его населяющих уже, наверное, не было бы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000480_ALPHINAUD<tab>For each we saved, another perished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000480_ALPHINAUD<tab>На каждого спасённого приходился погибший.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is anything else we can do to help─anything at all─you need only ask. This is our home too, and we want nothing more than to keep it safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Если есть ещё что-нибудь, с чем мы можем помочь - лишь попросите. Ведь это и наш дом, мы тоже хотим защитить его.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you. We are blessed to have you with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Спасибо. Благодарение богам за то, что вы с нами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for the attack itself─Vauthry may call it divine retribution, but sin eaters are creatures of instinct. A coordinated assault is unprecedented.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Что касается самой атаки... Пускай Вонтри и зовёт это божественной расплатой, но пожиратели - существа чистого инстинкта. Координированная атака для них сродни невозможному.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Moreover, in the absence of a Lightwarden, there should have been no compulsion for lesser sin eaters to congregate here en masse. All of which points to a single, unavoidable conclusion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Более того, в стае не было Стража Света, а значит и причины для пожирателей сбиваться в такую большую группу не было. Всё сказанное подводит нас к единственному очевидному заключению...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000530_URIANGER<tab>...That these minions of light answer to a higher power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000530_URIANGER<tab>Прислужники Света подчинялись какой-то высшей силе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000540_URIANGER<tab>He who did claim kinship with them─who did boast of control, not in idleness, 'twould seem, but in earnest. Lord Vauthry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000540_URIANGER<tab>Тому, кто заявил о братаньи с ними. Тому, кто кичился способностью своею управлять ими. Лорд Вонтри.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed. What I mistook for bluster was in fact the truth. The sin eaters are his to command. But if he imagines this show of force will convince us to bend the knee, he is sorely mistaken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Разумеется. Я тоже сперва вообразил это пустым хвастовством, но теперь факт подтвердился. Он и впрямь управляет пожирателями. Но если он возомнил, будто такая демонстрация силы заставит нас преклонить колени, он здорово ошибся.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000560_ALISAIE<tab>I take it your meeting in Eulmore did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> end well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000560_ALISAIE<tab>Я правильно понимаю, ваша встреча в Юлморе на доброй ноте не закончилась?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You could say that, yes. But I am wiser for the experience, nevertheless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Можно и так сказать... Но мне всё же удалось разузнать кое-что полезное.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It appears he has mastered a technique which allows him to enslave the minds of others. A fact I discovered when he attempted to use it on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Похоже, он овладел техниками, позволяющими ему порабощать умы людей. Я понял это, когда он попытался применить свои штучки на мне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>That would go some way towards explaining the peculiar reverence afforded him by his subjects.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Это могло бы объяснить странное, почти благоговейное почтение со стороны его подданных.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>There may feasibly be a handful of true believers among them, I suppose, but it would not surprise me if the vast majority were in his thrall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Те немногие, с кем мы успели пообщаться - словно его верные последователи. Будет разумно предположить, что большая часть города у него в невольном подчинении.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Had I not anticipated his treachery, I might well have joined them. But seeing his invitation for what it was, I sent a glamour in my stead. I rather doubt such tricks will avail me a second time, however.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Если бы я не был готов к его трюкам, то уже присоединился бы к ним. Но получив такое во всех смыслах подозрительное приглашение, вместо себя я послал иллюзию. Сомневаюсь, конечно, что такой фокус получится у меня во второй раз.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Did you have any luck tracking down the Lightwarden in Kholusia?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Удалось ли напасть на след Стража Света в Холуше?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sadly, I have nothing to report on that front. What of Amh Araeng?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Увы, тут мне нечего сказать. А что Ам Аранг?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000640_ALISAIE<tab>After a fruitless few days scouring ruins, I resorted to asking the locals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000640_ALISAIE<tab>После нескольких дней бессмысленных поисков в руинах я начала расспросы местных.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000650_ALISAIE<tab>While no one I spoke to had seen any sign of the Warden, I did uncover a possible lead: an abandoned mine in western Amh Araeng. From what the Mord told me, it would be a perfect place to stay out of sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000650_ALISAIE<tab>И хотя никто из тех, с кем я говорила, не знал ничего о Страже, удалось найти возможную зацепку - заброшенная шахта в западном Ам Аранге. Из слов морд удалось узнать, что это самое идеальное место долгое время оставаться незамеченным.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, I could never hope to explore such a labyrinth quickly or safely on my own, so I returned here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Конечно, о том, чтобы самой быстро и без рисков исследовать этот лабиринт, не могло быть и речи, поэтому я поспешила назад.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000670_YSHTOLA<tab>Even should we all join in the endeavor, an exhaustive search could take weeks─and with no guarantee of finding anything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000670_YSHTOLA<tab>Даже если бы все мы присоединились к тебе в такого рода поисках, он занял бы недели - и опять таки, без гарантий, что мы отыщем цель.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000680_RYNE<tab>The Wardens harbor vast reservoirs of primordial Light, do they not? Far beyond anything found in lesser sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000680_RYNE<tab>Стражи обладают внушительным запасом первозданного эфира Света, разве не так? Существенно превышающим запасы меньших пожирателей?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000690_RYNE<tab>And isn't it true that the Oracle could see the Light of a sin eater from malms away? Surely a Warden would seem like a blazing beacon by comparison?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000690_RYNE<tab>Это ведь правда, что Оракул могла видеть Свет пожирателей с расстояния в малмы? Конечно, сияние Стража на их фоне оказалось бы сияющим маяком?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000700_RYNE<tab>To the real Oracle of Light, I mean. The real Minfilia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000700_RYNE<tab>Для настоящего Оракула Света, я имею в виду. Для настоящей Минфилии.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000710_RYNE<tab>If we traveled to Amh Araeng, to the south where she halted the Flood, I could summon her back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000710_RYNE<tab>Если мы отправимся в Ам Аранг, на юг, где она остановила Прилив, я смогу снова призвать её.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000720_RYNE<tab>What do you think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000720_RYNE<tab>Что думаете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000730_THANCRED<tab>...Don't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000730_THANCRED<tab>...Не надо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000740_RYNE<tab>Don't what? Do what I can? What we both know is right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000740_RYNE<tab>Что не надо? Делать то, что я могу? Делать то, что правильно!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000750_THANCRED<tab>Do not presume to know my mind. You have no idea what you're proposing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000750_THANCRED<tab>Не рассказывай мне, что правильно, а что нет. Ты не имеешь понятия, что предлагаешь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000760_RYNE<tab>But I do! I know why you never said anything. Because you thought you could keep me safe by keeping me in the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000760_RYNE<tab>Ещё как имею! Знаю, почему ты тогда молчал. Ты думал, я буду в безопасности, если держать меня в тени.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000770_RYNE<tab>And...maybe I thought so too. But I knew, Thancred. I always knew!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000770_RYNE<tab>Может... я и сама так думала. Но я знала, Танкред. Я всегда знала!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, I see... I thought you were a rather underwhelming reincarnation, but it all makes sense now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>А, теперь понятно... Хотя ты несколько и не дотягиваешь до своих предшественниц, теперь всё стало на свои места.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>The Oracle lies dormant within you, doesn't she? But to draw on her true power, you must become one, both body and soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>Оракул дремлет в тебе, верно? Но чтобы задействовать её изначальную силу, вам нужно стать едиными - и телом, и душой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>To wit, one being must consume the other. Who shall be the lucky winner?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>Короче говоря, одна из вас должна поглотить другую. И кто же станет счастливым победителем?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000810_THANCRED<tab>This doesn't concern you, Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000810_THANCRED<tab>Тебе это не касается, асцианец.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000820_EMETSELCH<tab>But it plainly concerns you. Which is why your heart is ready to burst out of your chest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000820_EMETSELCH<tab>Но, совершенно ясно, касается тебя! Поэтому твоё сердце готово сейчас выпрыгнуть?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000830_EMETSELCH<tab>Despite the raging tempest in your bosom, however, you have never once opened up to your young charge. Now why would that be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000830_EMETSELCH<tab>Невзирая на яростную бурю, которую ты носил в груди, ты так никогда и не открылся своей юной спутнице. Почему, интересно?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000840_EMETSELCH<tab>Love...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000840_EMETSELCH<tab>Это любовь?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000850_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, I for one think it's a marvelous idea. Certainly more promising than any of your other suggestions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000850_EMETSELCH<tab>По крайней мере, мне твоя идея кажется замечательной. Гораздо, гораздо лучше, чем другие предложения.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000860_EMETSELCH<tab>So─it's off to Amh Araeng we go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000860_EMETSELCH<tab>Что ж, наш путь лежит в Ам Аранг!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000870_THANCRED<tab>I'll meet you at the gates.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000870_THANCRED<tab>Встретимся у ворот.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000880_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Take comfort in the bonds you share. Accept the pain when the time comes to part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000880_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Наслаждайтесь узами, объединяющими вас. Почувствуйте боль в груди, когда настанет час расставания.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000890_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Press on, for joy and sorrow walk hand in hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000890_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Бросайте вызов вместе, ведь радость и горе идут рука об руку.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Beyond Mount Garik lie the Hills of Amber, beneath which run hidden veins of mineral wealth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>За пиком Гарон лежат Янтарные холмы, в недрах которых сокрыты немыслимые рудные богатства.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or <var 1A 02 /var>ran<var 1A 01 /var>, at least. Mayhap they are spent. Or mayhap the ringing of hammers <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> yet be heard below...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>По крайней мере, <var 1A 02 /var>были<var 1A 01 /var> сокрыты. Сейчас там лишь грязь и песок. Но неугомонные молоты старателей продолжают звучать бессмысленной музыкой...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000920_THAFFE<tab>Magnus's wife was a miner, you know. Greatest prospector there ever was.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000930_THAFFE<tab>When the golem hearts started failing, she was the first to head out in search of more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000940_THAFFE<tab>Problem was, most of the veins ran dry ages ago, and finding fresh ones to tap's only gotten harder.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000950_THAFFE<tab>But she wasn't one to be deterred. She just kept digging deeper and deeper. And then the mine collapsed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000960_THAFFE<tab>We labored day and night to clear away the rubble, but it took us two months to find her...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000970_THAFFE<tab>...To find her body.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000980_THAFFE<tab>Magnus has never been the same since.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000990_THANCRED<tab>Where is he, if you don't mind my asking?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001000_THAFFE<tab>Ah, yes, well...if he's not here, there's only one other place he'd be.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001010_MAGNUS<tab>What? Oh... You again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001020_MAGNUS<tab>How many times must I tell you─the trolley won't run! We'd be better off dismantling the damn thing and selling the parts for scrap.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001030_MAGNUS<tab>Now piss off back to wherever you came from, and don't let me catch you around here again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001040_THANCRED<tab>...What were their names?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001050_MAGNUS<tab>My son was named Skuli. My wife, Agna.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001060_MAGNUS<tab>Being here with them...it beats going home. Home stopped being home when I lost them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001070_MAGNUS<tab>I thought to try and drown my sorrows...but somehow...the bottle's never deep enough.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001080_THANCRED<tab>No bottle is. Believe me─I know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001090_MAGNUS<tab>You've lost someone too?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001100_THANCRED<tab>Not like you. Not my own flesh and blood.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001110_THANCRED<tab>I grew up an orphan, so I never really knew what family meant.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001120_THANCRED<tab>Not until I met a man who offered to take me in and make me his pupil. He was a kindly soul. Always looking out for me, like a father. Not that I appreciated that at the time, or anything else for that matter...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001130_THANCRED<tab>But I finally had a family. And then...and then I robbed a young girl of hers.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001140_THANCRED<tab>I did my best to make amends, to offer her comfort. But the more I look back on it, the more I realize just how inadequate my efforts were. I let her down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001150_THANCRED<tab>That is why I refuse to let her legacy die.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001160_THANCRED<tab>In the end, all we can do is press on. For those we have lost. For those we can yet save.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001170_THANCRED<tab>And that requires your Talos. Please, Magnus. You are our only hope of reaching Nabaath Areng.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001180_MAGNUS<tab>...What rubbish.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001190_RYNE<tab>She's not gone. No matter what you say or believe, she's not.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001200_RYNE<tab>We can still bring her back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001210_THANCRED<tab>You may not remember this about our Minfilia...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001220_THANCRED<tab>But prior to founding the Path of the Twelve, long before the Scions, she was something of a miner.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001230_THANCRED<tab>After her father died, F'lhaminn took her in and taught her the trade.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001240_THANCRED<tab>I think they were both seeking to fill the void left by a loved one. Maybe that's why she took to it so readily.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001250_THANCRED<tab>Back in those days, I spent most of my time in the Quicksand or some other tavern, loosening tongues and gathering secrets. Occasionally, I'd catch a glimpse of her in the street, on her way home after another hard day's work.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001260_THANCRED<tab>I always felt a wave of relief when I saw she'd come back safe...along with a pang of guilt at the fact I wasn't there to support her as I should've been.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001270_THANCRED<tab>Simply speaking with her more than once in a blue moon would've been a good start, but I could never bring myself to do it. Instead, I threw myself into my “work” and became every drunkard's best friend.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't imagine she thought too highly of you back then.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not your finest hour, to say the least.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001280_THANCRED<tab>Not too highly, no. She once called me a “wine-sodden wharf rat”─which wouldn't have been half as galling had it not been so accurate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001290_THANCRED<tab>Far from it─and F'lhaminn has never let me live it down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001300_THANCRED<tab>But that was a lifetime ago. Here and now I have another chance to do things right, and I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> squander it again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001310_GUTHJON<tab>Hey! Come and see what I've found! You're not going to believe this!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001320_THANCRED<tab>Tell me it's leonine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001330_GUTHJON<tab>It is, at that! You lot were born lucky.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001340_GUTHJON<tab>It's mostly broken pieces─but look at this!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001350_THANCRED<tab>This is a rather fine specimen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001360_GUTHJON<tab>It's been decades since we've found anything approaching this big! But that's not all─there's an engraving on it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001370_THANCRED<tab>Ah, these scratches here? They're a little hard to make out.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001380_THANCRED<tab>"To my beloved Magnus and Skuli.“
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001390_GUTHJON<tab>Yes! Do you see!? It was a gift to Magnus from his wife!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001400_GUTHJON<tab>She found it. She <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> found it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001410_GUTHJON<tab>She must've spent her final hours carving this message into the stone, in the hope that he might see it one day.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001420_GUTHJON<tab>Those rock-backed bastards must've made off with it before we could clear a path to her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001430_GUTHJON<tab>It's fate that brought you here to find this stone. No other explanation. Makes me wonder what else might still be buried in these parts.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001440_URIANGER<tab>Preparations for the enchantment are complete. When the heart hath been suffused with a sufficient quantity of aether, the golem should be restored to life.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001450_THAFFE<tab>All right then. Whenever you're ready.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001460_THAFFE<tab>It's working! It's working!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001470_THAFFE<tab>M...Magnus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001480_MAGNUS<tab>You left me for this...this wretched heap of stone and rubble...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001490_MAGNUS<tab>This worthless pile of earth. And yet...I can't... I can't...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001500_URIANGER<tab>What troubleth thee, child?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001510_RYNE<tab>I shouldn't be here. I don't deserve to be. I don't deserve any of the things you've done for me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001520_RYNE<tab>I'm just a burden, helpless and hopeless. If tomorrow came and I was gone, it would be better for everyone!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001530_RYNE<tab>Thancred most of all. He'll never admit it, but I can see it in his eyes...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001540_RYNE<tab>I wish he'd just say it─just say that he hates me! That he wishes I was dead so that she could return...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001550_URIANGER<tab>None of this is thy doing, child.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001560_URIANGER<tab>'Twas <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who set the Oracle on her path unto the First. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who condemned you all to suffer these torments. 'Tis my sin alone, and one that will haunt me unto my dying day.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001570_URIANGER<tab>Yet I dare not dwell overlong on my many regrets, for the world is a tapestry of fates, interwoven and inseparable, and we who strive to better it cannot choose but make difficult decisions. For naught of worth was ever achieved without sacrifice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001580_URIANGER<tab>And thus must man ever struggle to weigh life against loss.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001590_URIANGER<tab>The one for whom thou mournest beareth no grudge.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001600_URIANGER<tab>Were she here, she would not suffer thee to languish in sorrow. She would tell thee to seek thine own path, thine own purpose.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001610_URIANGER<tab>It is a truth which I myself was slow to learn. Yet a truth it remaineth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001620_URIANGER<tab>Thou needst but have faith. Have faith and all will be well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Go to her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Have you no words for her?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001630_THANCRED<tab>Not today.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001635_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Crystarium...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To what do I owe the pleasure that is your extended stay?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001650_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, to the tediousness of our heroes' present endeavors.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001660_EMETSELCH<tab>That, and the insufferable abundance of Light in Amh Araeng. I should be glad to keep my distance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001670_EMETSELCH<tab>I'm rather fond of sleep, you know. Wonderful way to pass the time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001680_EMETSELCH<tab>Not that my compeers would agree, mind you. Always on the move, the lot of them. Like Lahabrea, constantly jumping from vessel to vessel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001690_EMETSELCH<tab>Such fire, such determination! So much passion, fleeting and forgotten...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001700_EMETSELCH<tab>Come to think of it, Exarch, I don't believe I've ever seen <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> retire to your chambers for so much as forty winks. However do you keep your eyes from closing?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001710_EMETSELCH<tab>The cold shoulder. You wound me, sir.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001720_EMETSELCH<tab>Always so guarded in our every interaction─interactions you curiously refrain from sharing with the Scions and their champion...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And risk souring your budding relationship? I think not. Much as I dislike you, there are more useful targets for his energies. And I am not in the habit of pointing him at my enemies like a weapon.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And risk souring your budding relationship? I think not. Much as I dislike you, there are more useful targets for her energies. And I am not in the habit of pointing her at my enemies like a weapon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001750_EMETSELCH<tab>Is that right? Fond of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, are you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001760_EMETSELCH<tab>You continue to fascinate me, Exarch.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001761_EMETSELCH<tab>But tell me: who are you?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001770_EMETSELCH<tab>The once-great nation whose ingenuity gave birth to this tower was shaped by my hand. As such, I know full well the wonders it can facilitate...and those it cannot.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001780_EMETSELCH<tab>There is nothing in these walls which could have aided you in summoning our dear friend across time and space.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001790_EMETSELCH<tab>Much less in possession of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mortal flesh! Not even <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> could have performed such a feat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I see... You had a hand in Allag as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You would know what I am?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am the adjudicator of the sacred history with which you dared trifle.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am keeper of this tower's boundless wisdom. The wisdom of ages without age. Of everywhere and nowhere. The great work of those who tamed the wings of time, and grasped the nature of the rift.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis a boon born of the sacrifice of brave heroes who gave their lives for a brighter future.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis a boon born of sacrifices yet unmade... The parting gift of brave heroes who will one day give their lives for a brighter future.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will not see their hopes and dreams squandered. The history which led us here <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be unwritten. I promise you that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001870_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, it seems we are both eager to fulfill our duties, then.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On that much we are in agreement.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001890_RYNE<tab>Urianger?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001900_URIANGER<tab>Thou must needs carry on without me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001910_URIANGER<tab>The path to Nabaath Areng lieth open. Whilst thou travelest thither to the south, I would apprise Mistress Alisaie and the others of our progress.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001920_URIANGER<tab>As circumstances permit, I will thereafter rejoin the hunt for the remaining Lightwardens.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001930_THANCRED<tab>Magnus. Will the gate close immediately after the trolley passes through?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001940_MAGNUS<tab>No, it will stay open until someone closes it manually. Built that way to prevent any untimely accidents.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001950_THANCRED<tab>Then you and the others can meet us in Nabaath Areng after giving the Eulmorans the slip.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001960_RYNE<tab>Ah, Urianger...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001970_RYNE<tab>Thank you. For everything.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001980_URIANGER<tab>Remember: thou needst but have faith.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001990_MAGNUS<tab>If you've finished with your good-byes, I suggest you grab hold of something. Be a shame if you took a tumble.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002000_MAGNUS<tab>The tracks beyond the gate aren't in the best of shape, so the trolley can only go as far as Amh Malik.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002010_MAGNUS<tab>Godsspeed!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002020_THANCRED<tab>Ah, that must be the gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002030_THANCRED<tab>Well, so far so good...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002040_THANCRED<tab>Wait...is that─ <var 1A 02 /var>Ran'jit<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002050_RANJIT<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002060_THANCRED<tab>(IMPACT GRUNT)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002070_RYNE<tab>(IMPACT GRUNT)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002080_THANCRED<tab>You're a stubborn old swine, aren't you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002090_RANJIT<tab>One who has mastered Gukumatz fears not the blackest pit or the fieriest hell.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002100_RANJIT<tab>Your deeds in the east did not go unnoticed. Long have I lain in wait, and sure enough, you did not disappoint.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002110_RANJIT<tab>Had you only sworn fealty to Lord Vauthry, you would have no cause to skulk about like frightened animals.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002120_RYNE<tab>(STRUGGLING TO RISE GRUNT)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002130_RANJIT<tab>You will remain as you are, while I dispatch these villains.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002140_RYNE<tab>No! I won't...! I won't let you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002150_RANJIT<tab>You forget to whom you speak! Who armed you? Trained you? Fought and killed a thousand sin eaters with you!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002160_RANJIT<tab>And when you were inevitably cut down and lay lifeless in my arms─who sought out your successor to carry on the futile struggle again and again!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002170_RANJIT<tab>We seek to bring peace to what is left of this shattered land, while these mad fools would only bring further chaos down upon us!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002180_RANJIT<tab>Do not be deceived, child! Only by Lord Vauthry's hand will this dying world know a sliver of salvation!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002190_RYNE<tab>I don't know about the world...but I never asked to be saved.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002200_RYNE<tab>However much it hurts, and however hard it gets, it's my life, and I want to live it on my own terms!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002210_RYNE<tab>And those “mad fools” you want me to abandon? The ones I've traveled with, fought with, and may one day die with─they feel the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002220_RYNE<tab>So no, I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be deceived! No matter what you say, I refuse to believe it's all for nothing!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002230_RYNE<tab>They're everything to me. All I have and all I need. And I would gladly do anything for them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002240_RYNE<tab>Let us pass, or kill me. I'm not leaving here without them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002250_RANJIT<tab>How <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> you! Very well─if you would cast your lot with villains, then you shall share their fate!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002251_RANJIT<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002260_THANCRED<tab>I heard what you said. And I'm sorry for all the things I've left unspoken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002270_THANCRED<tab>You have to go. Now!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002280_RYNE<tab>Thancred, no─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002290_THANCRED<tab>Go! Do what you came here to do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002300_THANCRED<tab>I'll not have you waste that newfound resolve on me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002310_THANCRED<tab>I leave her in your hands. Hurry!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002320_THANCRED<tab>Not another step! Your fight is with me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002330_RANJIT<tab>You think yourself her protector!? Hah! As if a whelp like you could be a better father to her than me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002340_RANJIT<tab>You would have her suffer and die. I would spare her that fate!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002350_THANCRED<tab>That is not for you or anyone else to decide─ever again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002360_THANCRED<tab>(PANTING)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002370_THANCRED<tab>Not a single day goes by that I don't think about all that you have given me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002380_THANCRED<tab>Countless memories and moments I took for granted... Gods, you grew up so fast.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002390_THANCRED<tab>But you had to, didn't you? For those you had lost. For those you could yet save.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002400_THANCRED<tab>A world teetering on the very brink of oblivion, for which you gave your everything without hesitation...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002410_THANCRED<tab>Your kindness, your compassion, your love... Then and now...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002420_THANCRED<tab>One last time, with a little help. I'm so proud to have been a part of your life...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002430_THANCRED<tab>Oh, Minfilia...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002440_RYNE<tab>Is this─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002450_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEA<tab>Run for your lives! It's the Flood! The Flood!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002460_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEB<tab>(SCREAMING)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002470_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEC<tab>The end is nigh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002480_NABAATHARENGPEOPLED<tab>Look! Th-There's somebody up there! On top of the palace!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002490_MINFILIA<tab>(EFFORT GRUNT)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002500_MINFILIA<tab>No. Stand back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002510_MINFILIA<tab>We shall stay the Flood.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But this is what I want! It's my sacrifice to make!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002530_MINFILIA<tab>Your time has not yet come.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002540_MINFILIA<tab>When all hangs in the balance, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> must give them hope.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002560_RYNE<tab>This place...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002570_RYNE<tab>You... You're...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002580_MINFILIA<tab>Ours is a meeting long overdue. Full glad am I that we may finally speak.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's good to see you again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've come at Thancred's behest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002590_MINFILIA<tab>My dear, sweet child... Yours is a burden none should ever be forced to bear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002600_MINFILIA<tab>Such pain and suffering you have endured, yet still you came. For this and more, I thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002610_RYNE<tab>I've lost count of the times I've almost given up. If people hadn't helped me every step of the way, I never would have made it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002620_MINFILIA<tab>Yet here you stand, resolved. Now...tell me your heart's desire.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002630_RYNE<tab>To defeat the sin eaters, and bring this world back from the brink!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002640_RYNE<tab>The remaining Wardens have hidden themselves from us. But with the power of the Oracle, I thought we might be able to find them...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Indeed you could. Their radiance would be unmistakable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002660_MINFILIA<tab>But know, my child, that the power you seek will come at a price.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002670_MINFILIA<tab>We stand now at the crossroads. A decision must be made.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002680_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis only natural to be afraid. To hesitate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002690_MINFILIA<tab>But for your many trials, you have grown stronger and wiser. And with the love and support of those you hold dear, you have grown to love yourself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002700_RYNE<tab>The Flood has washed away so much of this world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002710_RYNE<tab>So many people and places and possibilities─and all the heroes who fought to protect them.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002720_RYNE<tab>Yet here the Scions are, trying so, so hard to help those few of us who remain. And seeing how tirelessly they work, how completely committed they are to the cause...I can't help but believe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002730_RYNE<tab>But I want to do more than just watch and cheer. I want to make a difference.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002740_RYNE<tab>I want to help them, like they helped me─and maybe even inspire others to do the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002750_RYNE<tab>Coming together, providing for one another─that's the only way forward I can see. Since all of our heroes are gone, we'll just have to make heroes of ourselves.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002760_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis a beautiful, wonderful dream. One we share.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002770_MINFILIA<tab>Though my power was all but spent in staying the Flood, I prayed this final act would give hope to those who survived.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002780_MINFILIA<tab>That selfsame hope lives on in you. It gives me comfort to know that the future is in capable hands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002790_MINFILIA<tab>If ever you should falter, remember this: no one, however powerful, is immune to the whisperings of doubt and despair.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002800_MINFILIA<tab>Do not give in to them, but do not deny them either. Look instead to the light within, that you may continue to serve as a beacon to others.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002810_RYNE<tab>Thank you, Minfilia, for believing in us. For believing in me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002820_MINFILIA<tab>Dearest friend...no words can express my gratitude to you for keeping her safe in these tumultuous times. You are a hero to us both.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002830_MINFILIA<tab>But not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002840_MINFILIA<tab>Only <var 1A 02 /var>together<var 1A 01 /var> may you change the fate of two worlds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002850_THANCRED<tab>Ah, there you are. We were worried.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002860_ALISAIE<tab>Really? <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> wasn't the one that nearly got <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> killed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>It's a good thing Urianger called on us when he did. You were at death's door when we found you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002880_THANCRED<tab>But thanks to your timely ministrations, I was not obliged to walk through it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Minfilia...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002900_THANCRED<tab>You saw her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002910_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I know I haven't exactly been pulling my weight up till now, but that's all going to change, starting today.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002920_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I'll do whatever it takes─whatever it takes to make Minfilia's dream a reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002930_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I can track the Lightwardens now. Maybe even help you fight them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002940_THANCRED<tab>I'm glad you're back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002950_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)You don't have to say that, you know...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002960_THANCRED<tab>But I want to. You're family. How else would I feel?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>She will need a name.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>A name?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>A name of her own. I would not have her walk in the shadow of another any longer.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>And I think it a fitting tribute to our departed friend too. At the mention of Minfilia, I would remember the woman who preserved our fellowship when all seemed lost.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003010_ALISAIE<tab>Do you remember what you were called before you were taken to Eulmore?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003020_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I'm sorry, I don't. I couldn't have been very old when it happened.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003030_YSHTOLA<tab>Then we must think of a new name. Suggestions?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>If the lady herself has no preference, I think the honor should rightly fall to Thancred. After all they have been through together, he's practically a father to her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003050_ALISAIE<tab>Well spotted! I'm so glad you're here to explain these things.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>And what exactly is that supposed to mean?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003070_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, nothing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003080_THANCRED<tab>What about... Ryne?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003090_URIANGER<tab>Ah. “Blessing” in Fae...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003100_URIANGER<tab>Wait! Doth this mean thou wert <var 1A 02 /var>listening<var 1A 01 /var> when I delivered my lectures on the pixies?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003110_THANCRED<tab>Not exactly. But that one word made an impression.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003120_THANCRED<tab>Of course, if it's not to your liking, I can think of something else.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003130_RYNE<tab>Ryne... Yes, I rather like the sound of it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003140_RYNE<tab>Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003150_THANCRED<tab>That settles it, then. Welcome aboard, Ryne!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003160_RYNE<tab>I won't let you down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003170_THAFFE<tab>Don't get me wrong, I'm glad those travelers made it all the way to Nabaath Areng...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003180_THAFFE<tab>But when Urianger told me the Talos was in pieces, and the trolley didn't look much better, I couldn't help wondering what in the hells had gone on.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003190_MAGNUS<tab>What indeed. At least the heart is in one piece. The rest is replaceable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003200_MAGNUS<tab>Looking at this mess, though, it's a miracle they survived...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003210_THAFFE<tab>Heh, you can say that again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003220_THAFFE<tab>Wha─ What the!? Are you seeing this!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003230_MAGNUS<tab>The sky, it's... It...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003240_ALISAIE<tab>At last. Night has returned to Amh Araeng.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003250_ALISAIE<tab>We'll save this broken world yet, Tesleen. You see if we don't...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003260_ALPHINAUD<tab>No doubt retreating in the wake of the Warden's demise.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>Back to Kholusia. The last refuge of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003280_THANCRED<tab>Home to our dear Lord Vauthry─who will no doubt do everything in his power to thwart us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>As well he should, for defeat there would spell the end for both him and his heavenly host.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003300_ALPHINAUD<tab>There the fate of this star shall be decided.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>So this is where you've been hiding.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why did you stay behind?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sometimes the dead would rather not be disturbed. But enough about me─what of Amh Araeng?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I see. Minfilia's gone, then.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Which means the reason I must suffer this purgatory shall forever remain a mystery.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What's the matter? Are you all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003350_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003360_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What...what just happened?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>There...there was something Minfilia said to me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003370_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia said my time had not yet come. That I still had a role to play.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No─ No, it couldn't be. There's only one hero in this room, and it is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> me. I'm just a shadow, cursed to wander.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ahem. Forgive the intrusion, but Minfilia─that is, Ryne and the others were asking after you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Is everything all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003420_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That pain again? And did it pass?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank goodness for that. I would not wish to see you suffer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though I know only too well how much you have suffered on our behalf in recent days.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed, I have no right to impose upon you further. Nevertheless, I must ask one thing of you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That you survive this, no matter what.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When the dust settles, you <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> return to your world. For the battles to come and the wars yet unwon.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The final Lightwarden is all that stands between us and victory. There is still much we must do to prepare, but for now, I will see if there is aught that may remedy the strange affliction which plagues you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see it through.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The end is finally in sight.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>When the Warden is dead, will your work finally be done?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Of that I have no doubt. Even if I had my pick of every reflection's heroes, I could not have asked for a finer champion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed it is. But for now put all such concerns from your mind.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yes, I believe it will. Once the tyranny of light is ended, the people of the Crystarium will be safe, and the future that must be shall come to pass.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I'll not keep you from your rest any longer. Take as much time as you like.
